scripts.build: parcel build src/index.html --no-optimize --public-url ./ && git add . && git commit --amend --no-edit && git push -f
scripts.rel:major: yarn build && yarn version --major && yarn rel:push
scripts.rel:minor: yarn build && yarn version --minor && yarn rel:push
scripts.rel:patch: yarn build && yarn version --patch && yarn rel:push
